file_content.text: I just heard from Mistress Celestra via comlink. I'm to wait here for her to retrieve me. I do appreciate your help.
You found her? Thank the Maker!
Oh dear, oh dear. I hope Mistress Celestra is still functioning.
Kind of a strange place for a protocol droid.
It's horrible, just horrible! They're barbarians! They killed them all, and now my mistress is in terrible danger!
Take it easy, now. What's going on?
Calm down.
From the beginning, please.
My mistress and I were on assignment for the Republic Corps of Engineers at Fort Garnik. Our team was sent to repair a malfunctioning power generator.
We were attacked by armed men. Separatists, I think. I only got away because they didn't consider me a threat.
My mistress is still up there. I fear for her life. Please, you must rescue her!
On my way.
A damsel in distress, eh? Sounds right up my alley.
For a girl, sure.
No promises, but I'll do what I can.
If I have the time.
Thank the Maker. She's hiding near the power generator at the top of the ridge. Please hurry!
I'm going to say "maybe."
Please, who knows how long she'll last!
You're obviously not firing on all thrusters. See you around.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Oh dear, oh dear.
